Everlyn Chemutai (amụrụ na 12 Ọktoba na afo 1976) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị nnọchiteanya nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda maka mpaghara Bukwo kemgbe afọ 2016. Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM).
A mụrụ Everlyn Chemutai na 12 Ọktoba na afo 1976
Ọ gụsịrị ule Primary Leaving na afo 1989 na Chebinyiny Primary School
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education na Gamatui Girls S.S
Ọ gara Sebei College Tegere ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education na afo 1997
E nyere ya diplọma na Business Studies site na Uganda College of Commerce, Soroti n'afọ 2000
Ọ gara maka agụmakwụkwọ ya ọzọ wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science in Accounting na Mahadum Makerere na afo 2012.
Everlyn Chemutai was an Accounts Assistant for Wilcon Enterprises, Soroti from 2001–2002
She became the Bursar for Moroto High School from 2002–2006
She became the Project Accountant for Africa Leadership Institute from 2004 - 2011
She was the Accounts/ Records Assistant for The AIDS support Organization (TASO) Uganda from 2012 -2015

She became the Member of Parliament  of Uganda from 2016 to date. She is the vice chairperson for the Committee on HIV/AIDS and Related Matters. She is also a member of the Committee on Agriculture, Animal Industry and Fisheries.
Ọ kwadoro egwuregwu bọọlụ, ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị kwadoro, ndị otu ndị mahadum kwadoro n'ime mpaghara ya.
Everlyn Chemutai sonyere na nnọkọ ndị omeiwu ebe ndị omeiwu ga-atụ vootu ma ha ga-ewepụ ụtụ isi Mobile Money ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị ma ọ sị YES.
